AUTHENTICATION.ENTER_PASSWORD_NUMBER: Password must contain at least 1 number
AUTHENTICATION.ENTER_PASSWORD_HAS_CAPITAL_CASE: Password must contain at least 1 capital case letter
AUTHENTICATION.ENTER_PASSWORD_HAS_SMALL_CASE: Password must contain at least 1 small case letter
AUTHENTICATION.ENTER_PASSWORD_HAS_SPECIAL_CHARS: Password must contain at least 1 special character
AUTHENTICATION.ENTER_PASSWORD_MINLENGTH: Password length must be at least 8 characters
